data.name: Cogolludo-Vivar journey
data.desc: Frays Lopez de Cogolldo and Luis de Vivar cross Hon en route fm Guat to Yuc via Pacha [N of Bacalar]
data.agents_sp: Fr Lopez de Cogolldo, Luis de Vivar
data.note: 1650 Fray de Cogolludo returns to Guat, possibly returning bia Hon /v Graham 160 /Cogolludo lib 12 cap 16
